subject: Re: [junit] Re: class cast exception
msgSnippet: ... And your patched file lives in c:/whatever/junit/runner/excluded.properties, and the classpath refers c:/whatever before junit.jar, right? I m guessing
messageBody:
yours_jeeva wrote:

> Yes Mike,
> But I am missing something.
>
> I extracted the excluded.properties from the jar and added an entry
> for my HomeInterface.
> And placed the whole file path on classpath prior to junit.jar
> I am running this tru a Ant Script.
> So I placed it in Ant classpath also.
> Still I am getting the same problem.
>

And your 'patched' file lives in
c:/whatever/junit/runner/excluded.properties, and the classpath refers
c:/whatever before junit.jar, right?

I'm guessing the classpath is incorrect.

Mike
